scripts.restart-db: npm run compose:down && npm run create-population-db
scripts.create-population-db: npm run compose:up && npm run cp-db-container && npm run exec-db-container
scripts.cp-db-container: npm run cp-users && npm run cp-meals && npm run cp-drinks && npm run cp-drinksCategory && npm run cp-mealsCategory
scripts.exec-db-container: npm run exec-users && npm run exec-meals && npm run exec-drinks && npm run exec-drinksCategory && npm run exec-mealsCategory
scripts.exec-users: docker exec -it mongodb-app-recipes mongoimport -d app-recipes -c users --file /tmp/users.json --jsonArray
scripts.exec-meals: docker exec -it mongodb-app-recipes mongoimport -d app-recipes -c meals --file /tmp/meals.json --jsonArray
scripts.exec-drinks: docker exec -it mongodb-app-recipes mongoimport -d app-recipes -c drinks --file /tmp/drinks.json --jsonArray
scripts.exec-drinksCategory: docker exec -it mongodb-app-recipes mongoimport -d app-recipes -c drinks-categories --file /tmp/drinksCategory.json --jsonArray
scripts.exec-mealsCategory: docker exec -it mongodb-app-recipes mongoimport -d app-recipes -c meals-categories --file /tmp/mealsCategory.json --jsonArray
